item.title: Book Review: Killing Commendatore
item.description: Killing Commendatore by Murakami Haruki I think I have read every book by Murakami and I would regard him as my favorite author. I say I would regard him, because sometimes his work departs from my ideas of things, my idea of reality.

item.title: 300 swings 30 days updated
item.description: So I read a challenge on the web to do 300 kettlebell swings with a 24kg bell for 30 days. I am not sure why I have to add a line here. What is the difference with one line break. I am not sure. This is a test.

item.title: Markdown Guide
item.description: this is a favicon Markdown Cheat Sheet Thanks for visiting The Markdown Guide! This Markdown cheat sheet provides a quick overview of all the Markdown syntax elements. It can’t cover every edge case, so if you need more information about any of these elements, refer to the reference guides for basic syntax and extended syntax. Basic Syntax These are the elements outlined in John Gruber’s original design document. All Markdown applications support these elements.
